column1: #Text=The SESSION of PARLIAMENT for M.DCCC.XXV., exhibiting the State oT Parlies and Interests, the Debates and Enactments, and the whole Proceedings of both Houses of the British Legislature during that Period—One volume octavo, pp. 500, London.
#Text=To every Englishman who loves his country, and wishes to be acquainted with its laws, as what Englishman does not ?
#Text=this is one of the most important and necessary books that ever was published.

#Text=We do not, in the mean time, speak of the execution, but of die subject; for if a man can lay his hand upon a single volume of moderate size, and say, u herein I have a faithful outline of every important debate and enactment during a whole Session of Parliament," he is in possession of a fund of information, at once the most essentia] and the most desirable.
